link_desc:
With the pytds driver zbxdb can monitor SQL Server without any problem. zbxdb uses tls encryption for when you run in the cloud since v2.06

  • Low Level Discovery to detect the various components of a SQL Server cluster.
  • It monitors primary and slave databases, so it can also alert when a slave is running too far behind.
  • cluster member health
  • capacity
  • availability
  • sessions

Missing a feature? Add the SQL to etc/zbxdb_checks/mssql/*.cfg for your version and role (primary/slave) (or make a feature request on GitHub)

Missing a version? Start with copying the best fitting version to your missing version

see https://github.com/ikzelf/zbxdb for more details
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Trapper|Database Monitor|Custom Script
tags: SQL Server, primary, standby, slave, cluster
author: Ronald Rood
